title: How AMLO’s Crown Jewel Became World’s Deadliest Covid Company, Citi Names First Female CEO
itunes:title: How AMLO’s Crown Jewel Became World’s Deadliest Covid Company, Citi Names First Female CEO
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Mexico Energy Reporter Amy Stillman talk about how more employees have died at Pemex than at any other company in the world, but Mexico’s president wants to keep the oil producer pumping, no matter what. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane discusses Citi naming Jane Fraser as its next chief executive officer, succeeding Mike Corbat, who is retiring in February after more than eight years in the top job. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Masar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
